definitions.definition: A writing utensil with a graphite (commonly referred to as lead) shaft, usually blended with clay, clad in wood, and sharpened to a taper.
An aggregate or collection of rays of light, especially when diverging from, or converging to, a point.
A family of geometric objects with a common property, such as the set of lines that pass through a given point in a projective plane.

definitions.example: I penciled (BrE: pencilled) a brief reminder in my notebook.

definitions.definition: To mark with, or as if with, a pencil.
